full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA GA-YANG 'GUGS PA'I CHO GA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES RTA GA-YANG 'GUGS CHO GA 'DI NI YUL MI RNAMS RTA GA-YANG SHIN TU NYAMS NAS NYAM THAG LA BYAMS PA'I SEMS KYI KUN NAS BLANGS TE THA SHAL SMON LAM PA'I SPYOD YUL BA SU RE KARMA MING CAN GYIS, SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS GA-YANG KHUG SOGS LA GZHI BYAS NAS 'PHRAL DU BRIS PA'O, ,'DI LA NOR 'KHRUL 'BYUNG MKHAS PA RNAMS LA 'CHAGS SO, ,BDAG LA SGRIB PA MI 'BYUNG BAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA, ,DGE BAS 'GRO KUN DBUL BA'I SDUG BSNGAL DANG 'BRAL NAS MYUR DU DAG PA'I ZHING KHAMS SU SKYE BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
